org.epics.ioc.ca
Interface ChannelGet

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseV3ChannelGet
public interface ChannelGet

Request to get data from a channel.

Author:
mrk

Method Summary
 void destroy()
          Destroy the ChannelGet.
 void get()
          Get data from the channel.
 void getDelayed(org.epics.pvData.pv.PVField pvField)
          If ChannelGetRequester.nextGetData or ChannelGetRequester.nextDelayedGetData returns true this is the call to ask again for the data.
 

Method Detail

get

void get()
Get data from the channel. This fails if the request can not be satisfied. If it fails ChannelGetRequester.getDone is called before get returns.

getDelayed

void getDelayed(org.epics.pvData.pv.PVField pvField)
If ChannelGetRequester.nextGetData or ChannelGetRequester.nextDelayedGetData returns true this is the call to ask again for the data. The result is that the underlying database is locked and ChannelGetRequester.nextDelayedGetData is called.

Parameters:
pvField - The pvField to get.

destroy

void destroy()
Destroy the ChannelGet.
